entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of drizzle or rain. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon then 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
